attributes.action: extend the smoking ban to include hotel bedrooms where smoke travels into non-smokers rooms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is ridiculous to think that smoking in a hotel bedroom will not drift into non-smokers bedrooms, who do not have any choice but to breath in noxious fumes. Hotel bedrooms are public places not private homes. Non-smokers have a right to stay in hotels without being exposed to second hand smoke fumes.
